https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/31C9f9C2Xgil5ivD0FkONcalKT8.jpg A Hispanic family find hope in their extraordinary son named Sailboat when a personal gesture awakens a global desire. Armed with a "little guitar", Sailboat leads an offbeat cast into the miraculous story of the greatest secret never told. A Boy Called Sailboat
